ValidationRule.description: When a Merge or to be discussed is selected force Merge Notes to be populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISPICKVAL(Account_Status__c , "To Be Discussed") || ISPICKVAL(Account_Status__c , "To Be Merged")) && ISBLANK( Merge_Delete_Note__c ) = TRUE
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Merge Notes must be filled in when To be Discussed or To be Merged is selected as a Status.
